title: David Scrimgeour on Healing from the Soul
body:
How do your feelings affect your health? Acupuncturist David Scrimgeour, who treats adrenal fatigue, hormonal imbalances and chronic diseases, explains the Chinese Medicine point of view.

David Scrimgeour, L.Ac, CH received a BA degree from the University of Colorado in Chinese Language and Literature and East Asian Studies and attended a Master’s Program at U.C. Berkeley in East Asian Studies. He went on to study Acupuncture & Chinese Medicine graduating with an MS in Traditional Chinese Medicine from the American College of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

body:

Author of Chronic Fatigue, ME and Fibromyalgia: The Natural Recovery Plan, Alison Adams is a dentist, naturopath and former autoimmune disease sufferer. She holds UK and US degrees in dentistry, eight diplomas in various aspects of natural health and is recognized by all the associated professional bodies.
teaser: Is chronic mercury poisoning from amalgam fillings adversely affecting our health?

A free-lance investigative reporter for over 30 years, Jon Rappoport lectures all over the US asking: Who runs the world and what can we do about it? Over the last 30 years, Jon's independent research has encompassed such areas as deep politics, conspiracies, alternative health, the potential of the human imagination, mind control, the medical cartel, symbology, and solutions to the takeover of the planet by hidden elites.

Dr. Cohen is a classical homeopath and a highly regarded researcher in the areas of science, mysticism and healing. He currently runs the Center for The Healing Process in Menlo Park, California and regularly teaches workshops and classes in the healing arts.

Robert M. Williams, M.A. is the originator of PSYCH-K™, a safe and effective way to change self-limiting subconscious beliefs. He is author of PSYCH-K: The Missing Peace in Your Life, as well as being a popular lecturer and seminar leader. Dr. Thompson received her Ph.D. in Nutrition and Human behavior from Ryokan College in Los Angeles, California, studied naturopathy and iridology with Dr. Bernard Jensen, and is board certified in Naturopathic Endocrinology through the American Naturopathic Medical Association.

He has studied Homeopathic and herbal medicines in Europe, the United States, China, Japan, South America and Africa, and holds a Physician Associate family practice degree from Touro College in New York.

Fellow to the American Academy for the Advancement of Science, Professor Emeritus William A. Tiller, of Stanford University’s Department of Materials Science and Engineering, spent 34 years in academia after nine years as an advisory physicist with the Westinghouse Research Laboratories. He is currently researching and collecting experimental data in the field of psychoenergetic science, which he thinks will become a very important part of tomorrow's physics. In 1998, he used this knowledge to invent a sound-and-light-wave technology that helps the human body perform its natural ability to heal itself. He called it the Life Vessel. Since then, people around the world enjoy a better quality of life after experiencing the benefits of the Life Vessel.
teaser: What if there were a way for our bodies to realign with its inherent intelligence while we sleep, allowing us to wake up feeling refreshed and renewed every single day? There may just be.

title: The Hidden Power of Coffee with Dave Asprey
body:
Can a simple cup of coffee start your day off right; to curb cravings, clear your thoughts and give you hours of energy? Biohacking seeks to discover the maximum human potential for health and healing, and coffee may be its secret ingredient. Biohacker Dave Asprey reveals that he has unlocked the hidden power of coffee for improving health in the body and brain.

Dave Asprey lost 100 pounds, increased his IQ by more than 20 points, lowered his biological age and learned to sleep more efficiently in less time. These seemingly impossible things transformed him into a better entrepreneur, a better husband, and a better father. What emerged is the idea of being Bulletproof; a state of high performance where you take control of your biochemistry, body and mind so they work in unison, helping you execute at levels far beyond what you’d expect.

Gaia employees replaced their morning cup of joe with Bulletproof coffee. Read what happened on the blog.
teaser: Can a simple cup of coffee start your day off right; to curb cravings, clear your thoughts and give you hours of energy? Biohacker Dave Asprey reveals that he has unlocked the hidden power of coffee for improving health in the body and brain.

title: Detoxing Fukushima with Katrine Volynsky
body:
In the wake of Fukushima, America’s West Coast is awash with increasing levels of radiation. After the devastation of Chernobyl, we have become more aware of the harmful effects of radiation and have a better understanding of what we can do about it. Katrine Volynsky shares her story of survival through the Chernobyl catastrophe and explains how we can protect and cleanse ourselves from the dangers of radiation.

Katrine Volynsky, author of Staying Alive in A Toxic World, is a sports nutritionist, wellness coach and heavy metals detoxification specialist. After being negatively affected by radiation fallout from Chernobyl, she had to find her own path to health and gained a wide knowledge of natural methods for detoxifying and rebuilding the body. Now, she helps individuals achieve their health goals through a combination of state-of-the-art technology, nutrition and holistic healing.
teaser: After the devastation of Chernobyl, we have better understanding of how we can detox from Fukushima. Katrine Volynsky shares her story of survival through the Chernobyl catastrophe and explains how we can protect and cleanse ourselves from the dangers of radiation.

title: Fifth Element of Wellbeing with Bryant Meyers
body:
Food, water, sunlight and oxygen are vital elements for our wellbeing. In order to maintain an optimum state of health, our bodies also require a precise balance of electricity and magnetism. Bryant Meyers has passionately studied the effects of pulsed electro-magnetic frequencies on the human body and shares his insight into the fifth element of human health.

Bryant Meyers, author of PEMF - The Fifth Element of Health, is a former physics professor, TV show host, and leading expert in the field of energy medicine. For over eighteen years, he has researched, and tested many different energy medicine and frequency devices. He has dedicated his life and research to PEMF (Pulsed Electromagnetic Field) therapy, which he feels is the crown jewel of energy medicine.
teaser: To maintain an optimum state of health, our bodies require a precise balance of electricity and magnetism. Bryant Meyers explains the effects of pulsed electro-magnetic frequencies and shares his insight into the fifth element of human health.

title: Natural Longevity with Nick Delgado
body:
Do you want to live forever or at least a lot longer than previously expected? Science and technology have already extended human life expectancy to unprecedented levels, and people want even more. The secret may lie in our hormonal balance. Nick Delgado has worked with some of the most prominent anti-aging researchers and brings forward new ways that we can balance our hormones and promote longevity naturally. 


After a frightening mini stroke at the age of 23, Nick Delgado devoted himself to becoming healthier; a fitness role model that would lead others to great health. Nick Delgado graduated from the University of Southern California and served as Director of the Pritikin Better Health Program of the Nathan Pritikin Longevity Center. He is one of the world’s primary experts on anti-aging and an inspiration to those athletes who think their career ends at age 40.
teaser: Do you want to live forever or at least a lot longer than previously expected? Nick Delgado has worked with some of the most prominent anti-aging researchers and brings forward new ways that we can balance our hormones and promote longevity naturally.

title: Radiant Detox with Katrine Volynsky
body:
Vibrant health begins with simple steps. Breathing cycles, quality of water and sun therapy are important components to staying alive in a toxic world. Knowing this, you now have the choice to just stay alive or to thrive. Katrine Volynsky survived massive amounts of radiation from Chernobyl by learning how to remove toxins from the body. She shares what she has learned about detoxing and promoting vibrant health. 


Katrine Volynsky, author of Staying Alive in A Toxic World, is a sports nutritionist, wellness coach and heavy metals detoxification specialist. After being negatively affected by radiation fallout from Chernobyl, she had to find her own path to health and gained a wide knowledge of natural methods for detoxifying and rebuilding the body. Now, she helps individuals achieve their health goals through a combination of state-of-the-art technology, nutrition and holistic healing.
teaser: Vibrant health begins with simple steps. Breathing cycles, quality of water and sun therapy are important components to staying alive in a toxic world. Katrine Volynsky shares what she has learned about detoxing and promoting vibrant health.

title: Cord Blood Benefits with Charis Ober
body:
Despite the controversies, stem cell research has made amazing advancements in the treatment of previously untreatable conditions. Now private and public cord blood banks are opening all over the world to collect umbilical cord blood for lifesaving transplants and life-changing transfusions.  Charis Ober, a cord blood advocate and  the Executive Director of Save the Cord Foundation, explains the history of stem cell therapy and how these advancements help doctors treat previously untreatable conditions.

Charis Ober is the founder and Executive Director of Save the Cord Foundation, a 501c3 non-profit foundation that advocates for global cord blood education and awareness. Charis received her degree in Marketing from the University of Arizona, and has spent over 30 years working for pharmaceutical industry leaders;  Schering-Plough and  J and J's,  McNeil Pharmaceutical. Save the Cord Foundation was established after Charis met two children whose lives had been saved by a sibling cord blood transplant. Save the Cord Foundation is both a nationally and globally respected leader and voice in educating expectant parents and the public about private banking and public donation, along with the regenerative and lifesaving benefits of saving umbilical cord blood. Charis lives in Tucson, Arizona, has a son and daughter and is married to Dr. Richard Ober.
teaser: The greatest challenge of stem cell research is incompatibility between patient and donor has been solved. Charis Ober, who works with the Tucson Cord Blood Registry, explains the history of stem cell therapy and how these advancements help doctors treat previously untreatable conditions.

title: Clearing the Air of Chemtrails with Ken Rohla
body:
Chemtrails are becoming a daily reality for an increasing number of people whose health is being negatively impacted. We need to find an easy way to clear the air of these harmful particles and reverse the damage being done. The answers we seek may found with orgone technology and the power of consciousness. Ken Rohla has studied the causes and effects of weather modification and offers ways we can neutralize chemtrails.

Ken Rohla is a natural health educator and inventor who specializes in rejuvenation and cellular regeneration. As a cutting-edge researcher, he has studied with many pioneers in the sciences and natural health movement. In order to find the most effective solutions for the least amount of money, Ken uses and tests everything that he recommends. He lives what he teaches so he knows what really works, and what doesn't.
teaser: Chemtrails are becoming a daily reality for an increasing number of people whose health is being negatively impacted. We need to find an easy way to clear the air of these harmful particles and reverse the damage being done. Ken Rohla offers ways we can neutralize chemtrails with orgone technology and the power of consciousness.

title: Resolving Broken Family Dynamics with Elmar Dornberger
body:
Families can be a great source of delight and contentment as well as stress and sorrow. What we learn from these family dynamics affects every aspect of our lives, for better or worse. It’s good to know that we can move beyond this programming and heal all of our relationships. Elmar Dornberger explains how Constellation Therapy can heal generations of suffering by recognizing and resolving broken family dynamics. 


Elmar Dornberger grew up in a small town in southern Germany and came to the United States in 1981. His passion is learning to understand what makes people succeed and create win-win situations. He is relentless in his search for modalities that create change in the shortest and most sustainable way. To this end, he started Hemisphere Consulting, LLC in 2001 as a place to serve individuals, families and organizations.
teaser: Families can be a great source of delight and contentment as well as stress and sorrow. What we learn from these family dynamics affects every aspect of our lives, for better or worse. Elmar Dornberger explains how we can heal generations of suffering by recognizing and resolving broken family dynamics.

title: The Fats of Life with Udo Erasmus
body:
Fats and oils may be the most misunderstood aspects of a healthy diet. Many of us are bewildered by conflicting messages on which fats are beneficial and which ones are not. Unwittingly we may continue to consume harmful fats or attempt to avoid all fats completely. Udo Erasmus cuts through the confusion and explains which fats our brains and bodies need and which ones can contribute to ill health.


Udo Erasmus, Ph.D. introduced the importance of essential fats (EFA's) derived from organic flax seeds to the world. Because of his commitment to the field of fats and oils, there are now a variety of high-quality, EFA-rich oils available in health food stores and dispensaries around the world. His methods for producing unrefined oils, made with health in mind, are still used today by manufacturers of flax and other oils.
teaser: Fats and oils may be the most misunderstood aspects of a healthy diet. Many of us are bewildered by conflicting messages on which fats are beneficial and which ones are not. Udo Erasmus cuts through the confusion and explains which fats our brains and bodies need and which ones can contribute to ill health.

title: Secrets of NLP with Tom Dotz
body:
The depths of our minds conceal the pain and belief patterns which shape our concepts of reality. This causes us to behave in ways that are not conducive to our health or success, simply because some part of the mind believes that this is the only way to act. Tom Dotz, explains how you can use Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) to unlock these debilitating perceptions and release them from your psyche.

Tom Dotz is certified as an NLP Master Practitioner and Health Practitioner who has studied NLP since 1978. In 1990, he founded the NLP Institute of California which soon became the largest organization of its kind in the U.S.  In 1998, he acquired NLP Comprehensive where he continues to add new innovations to the structure, trainings, and products the company produces.
teaser: The depths of our minds conceal the pain and belief patterns which shape our concepts of reality. Tom Dotz, explains how you can use Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) to unlock these debilitating perceptions and release them from your psyche.

title: Lessons from the Rebel Road with Simran Singh
body:
Simran Singh set off on her Rebel Road tour with an open heart and mind. She had no idea of the lessons she would encounter or the impact she would have on people’s lives.  Her experience reinforced the importance of learning to listen to the universe and being present with the heart’s needs. From the first glint of inspiration to the life-changing teachings she shares with her audiences, Simran Singh recounts many lessons from her Rebel Road tour.

Simran Singh is a creative visionary, transformational catalyst and a leading voice for the journey of the soul. Her passionate style takes takes individuals on a journey into personal power, authenticity and presence. She helps people to understand that the universe is begging to have a conversation with each of us.
teaser: Simran Singh set off on her Rebel Road tour with an open heart and mind. From the first glint of inspiration to the life-changing teachings she shares with her audiences, Simran Signh recounts many lessons from her Rebel Road tour.

title: The Boy Who Died and Came Back with Robert Moss
body:
At three years old, Robert Moss died; he died again at age nine. The lessons he learned from these experiences were finally realized when he discovered the transformative power of active dreaming. Robert Moss recounts lessons from his multiple near death experiences which brought him into contact with multiple versions of his past and future selves living in parallel realities.

Robert Moss, author of Dreaming the Soul Back Home and Conscious Dreaming, combines dream work and shamanism in a system he calls Active Dreaming. This unique combination is the culmination of near-death experiences during his childhood, the traditional dreaming practices he learned from his friendship with Aborigines and his dream-guided study of many ancient and indigenous traditions. Now, he teaches his techniques all over the world.
teaser: Robert Moss recounts lessons from his multiple near death experiences which brought him into contact with multiple versions of his past and future selves living in parallel realities.

title: Organic Skincare with Joshua Onysko
body:
Nutrition is vitally important to the health of our body and our skin. Unbeknownst to many, our skin is exposed to hundreds of damaging and carcinogenic chemicals every day, many of which come from the skincare products we use. Joshua Onysko, founder of Pangea Organics, explains how you can feed and nourish your skin using organic nutrient-based skincare.

Joshua Onysko is the founder and CEO of Pangea Organics. After seven years of traveling the world, he decided that leading by example was the best way to influence others to reconsider their ways. Now, he hopes to reinvent the way we nurture our bodies with an awareness of how the products we consume directly impacts how we will live tomorrow.
teaser: Unbeknownst to many, our skin is exposed to hundreds of damaging and carcinogenic chemicals every day, many of which come from the skincare products we use. Joshua Onysko, founder of Pangea Organics, explains how you can feed and nourish your skin using organic nutrient-based skincare.

title: Vibrant Longevity with Patrick Flanagan
body:
As we march further into the 21st century, human life expectancy is expected to increase dramatically. But, what can we do to ensure that these extra years are full of life and happiness and not battling the ravages of degenerative diseases. Patrick Flanagan reveals the many benefits of negatively ionized hydrogen, where it can be found and how to prepare for a long, healthy and happy life.

Patrick Flanagan was a child prodigy in electronics who could read before he could talk. In 1952, he became a General Class Ham Radio Operator who designed and hand built all of his radio equipment. At 13, he invented the Neurophone which is a device that transmits sound through the skin directly to the brain. Life Magazine picked Flanagan as one of the top ten most promising upcoming scientists in the world in 1962.
teaser: As human life expectancy is expected to increase dramatically, what can we do to ensure that these extra years are full of life and happiness? Patrick Flanagan reveals the many benefits of negatively ionized hydrogen, where it can be found and how to prepare for a long, healthy and happy life.

title: Is There a Cure for Cancer?
body: For the past 40 years, Stanislaw Burzynski has been treating people diagnosed with cancer, in such a way that the FDA once considered him a criminal. However, the results speak for themselves, and after a long protracted legal battle, his methods are becoming accepted by medical institutions. Within this discussion, he gives us an overview of his revolutionary therapy for cancer, focusing on genetic causes, that has yielded incredible results and highlights some the problems with standard treatments. Plus, he gives us an introduction to the new projects he is working on that have shown great promise.
teaser: Stanislaw Burzynski has been treating people diagnosed with cancer in such a way that the FDA once considered him a criminal. He gives us an overview of his revolutionary therapy for cancer and highlights some the problems with standard treatments.

title: Natural Solutions for Mental Distress
body: Dr. Hyla Cass expresses her concerns that many mental disorders, ranging from depression and anxiety to addiction, are simply treated symptomatically with medications that often fall short of expectations, and may cause serious side effects as well. In contrast, rather than just treat the surface symptoms, she looks deeper to try and find the physiological cause of her patients’ mental distress. Optimal brain function can be achieved through a variety of modalities, including nutrition, supplementation, clearing environmental toxins and regulating consciousness through meditation, yoga, or a connection with nature. These all provide the basis for physiological and emotional balance, as well as a more awakened consciousness.
teaser: Dr. Hyla Cass explains that many mental disorders are simply treated with medications that often fall short of expectations. She looks deeper to find the cause of mental distress, rather than just treat the surface symptoms.

title: Natural Self-Healing
body: Dr. Ed Group, DC, is passionate about developing and providing natural health guidelines for those looking to uncover the root cause of disease. During his education, he came to the realization that pharmaceuticals may not be the best option for treating his patients. That is when he started to learn natural methods for treating the body, mind, and soul. He describes his process for discovering the cause, effect, and natural ways to treat the toxic loads we are exposed to. Ultimately, he helps people to learn how to heal themselves by reactivating their body’s self-healing mechanisms.
teaser: Dr. Ed Group, DC, describes his process for discovering the cause, effect, and natural ways to treat the toxic loads we are exposed to. Ultimately, he helps people to learn how to heal themselves by reactivating their body’s self-healing mechanisms.

title: New Hope with Functional Medicine
body: What if there was a way we could get to the root-cause of illness to restore our bodies to healthy function? This is the work of Dr. Jill Carnahan who explores imbalances within the body, stemming from nutrition and toxic loads. Through her own ordeals with Chron’s disease and cancer, which nearly killed her, she has a personal understanding of the toll that chronic illnesses can take. This helps her to connect with the plight of her patients. She discusses the cause of brain fog, fatigue, Crohn’s disease and cancer, then offers us some daily habits to help us detoxify from the environmental toxic load we are subjected to, daily.
teaser: Dr. Jill Carnahan explores imbalances within the body, stemming from nutrition and toxic loads.

title: Wisdom of Ayurveda
body:
Can the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda trump modern science for bringing the body into healthy states of wellbeing? Dr. John Douillard explains that at the heart of Ayurveda we find avenues of consciousness that allow body and mind to access deeper state of self-awareness and healing. He discusses the cause of brain fog, the importance of sleep, the connection between digestion and stress, and the critical nature of lymph functions. To help us better understand how we can access these deeper states of healing, he explains: circadian eating, the three-season diet, and ayurvedic psychology. 

Dr. John Douillard, DC, CAP is author of seven health books (including bestselling Eat Wheat and The 3-Season Diet), seven online courses (including new Yoga Journal course Ayurveda 201 on Ayurvedic Psychology), and numerous free eBooks. He is a former NBA nutritionist and creator of LifeSpa.com—where ancient Ayurvedic wisdom meets modern science—with thousands of free articles, resources, and videos. LifeSpa is a leading wellness resource, with nine million+ YouTube views and over 130k newsletter subscribers.
teaser: Can the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda trump modern science? Dr. John Douillard explains that at the heart of Ayurveda we find avenues of consciousness that allow body and mind to access deeper state of self-awareness and healing.

title: BioGeometry Part 1
body: What if the very geometry that surrounds you can influence your states of health and overall wellbeing? This is a startling discovery Ibrahim Karim made as he stumbled upon the effects stemming from the energy emanating from ancient Egyptian monuments. He came to develop this as a new science called BioGeometry. What he discovered is that some shapes are dangerous, while others can help to promote physical wellbeing. From the energy of geographic power spots upon lay lines to chakras and body positions, we explore how the geometry of the Earth and sacred architecture are connected with the movement and formations of subtle energies that influence health.
teaser: What if the geometry that surrounds you can influence your states of health and overall wellbeing? This is a startling discovery Ibrahim Karim made as he stumbled upon the effects stemming from the energy emanating from ancient Egyptian monuments.

title: BioGeometry Part 2
body:
With the increase in telecommunication technologies we are being increasingly inundated with potentially dangerous electromagnetic radiation. This is something that Ibrahim and Doreya Karim call Electro-Smog. They suggest that there may be a connection between the increase of EM emissions and chronic illness. To that effect, they discuss potential solutions, using BioGeometry, ranging from things we can do at home, solutions for hospitals and schools, and ways that we can protect environmental regions. They also share tools that can help to harmonize the energy of our being and living spaces.

These are solutions that have proven effective to rescue two towns in Switzerland from the devastating effects of EM radiation.
teaser: Ibrahim and Doreya Karim suggest that there may be a connection between the increase of EM emissions and chronic illness.

title: Microdosing for Transformation
body: Paul Austin discusses the responsible and intentional use of psychedelics for spiritual transformation. He explains how microdoses of LSD, Psilocybin, and other psychoactive materials can help productivity, creativity and flow states. From there we explore the benefits of combining microdosing with other consciousness enhancing practices, such as meditation and yoga. He claims the future is promising, as new research is underway combining different plant medicines for synergistic effects.
teaser: Paul Austin explains how microdoses of LSD, Psilocybin, and other psychoactive materials can help productivity, creativity and flow states.

title: Understanding the Human Experience
body: Marilyn Schlitz beautifully intertwines the empirical and the ineffable to give us new perspectives on human spirituality, the future of A.I. technology and how these will change the human experience. It is her mission to map human experiences to understand what underlies these timeless mysteries. Life, death, consciousness and reincarnation are some of the greatest mysteries that have intrigued every culture on Earth since the dawn of time. Now scientists are tackling these topics with great concern.
teaser: Marilyn Schlitz gives us new perspectives on human spirituality, the future of A.I. technology and how these will change the human experience. Life, death, consciousness and reincarnation are some of the mysteries we explore.

title: Healing Through Dance
body:
Nii Armah Sowah shares his unique perspective on the healing power of dance and rhythm, and the powerful effects it has on depression, confidence, social anxiety and healing the body. Individually, and collectively, we are all engaged in a dance of life. For every emotion we have, there is a sound and a movement. When we inhibit our natural inclination for expression, we get emotional constipation, which could impact wellbeing. This involves healing of the self by including ourselves in the healing of the larger community, through traditional communal dance.

Nii Armah Sowah is a Ghanaian-born arts educator.  Over the years, Nii Armah has worked professionally as a dancer, choreographer, singer, actor (television, film, and stage), public speaker, massage therapist, and expressive arts therapist. He passionately believes that dance is a human right, and therefore facilitates experiences that make dancing accessible for everyone – emotionally, physically and spiritually.
teaser: Nii Armah Sowah shares his unique perspective on the healing power of dance and rhythm, and the powerful effects it has on depression, confidence, social anxiety and healing the body.

title: Energy Healing Meets Modern Medicine
body:
Science is on the verge of accepting the validity of ancient healing practices. Shamini Jain stands between two worlds as she helps facilitate the scientific examination of various modalities of energy healing. Part of this is developing terminology that is readily accepted by scientists, so they can better understand how these methods work. One of the biggest hurdles they face is coming to terms with the distinction between healing and curing. Plus, she shares what she believes to be the single most important practice we can engage with to improve our overall wellbeing.

Dr. Shamini Jain is a psychologist, scientist, and social entrepreneur. She is the Founder and Director of the Consciousness and Healing Initiative (CHI), a collaborative accelerator that connects scientists, health practitioners, innovators, and social entrepreneurs to forward the science and practice of healing.
teaser: Science is on the verge of accepting the validity of ancient healing practices. Shamini Jain stands between two worlds as she helps facilitate the scientific examination of various modalities of energy healing.

title: Drug-Free Detox
body: Brigitte Mars suggests that we let nature nurture us back into healthy states. Today, many people who struggle with toxicity, addiction and dependency are looking for safe, drug-free ways to help their bodies. She suggests that the key to our wellness may well be in our own backyards, if we only know where to look. From dandelions to kratom, we explore many of nature’s remedies for regulating blood sugar, anxiety, depression, detoxification, and relieving dependency.
teaser: Brigitte Mars suggests that we let nature nurture us back into healthy states. From dandelions to kratom, we explore many of nature’s remedies for regulating blood sugar, anxiety, depression, detoxification, and relieving dependency.

title: Coherence of HeartMath
body:
Bridging humanity with science, HearthMath helps us incorporate the heart’s intelligence into our day-to-day experiences. Deborah Rozman offers us a quick introduction to some of the most powerful techniques that can help you to find a nice internal rhythm between heart & mind, and return to a state of coherence throughout your whole life. What she offers can help us move from personal coherence, within the body, to being energetically interconnected with others, by building social coherence.

Deborah Rozman is founding executive director of HeartMath Institute and a key spokesperson for HeartMath. She helps to develop, oversee and conduct HeartMath training programs, with over 30 years of experience as an entrepreneur, business executive, educator and author.
teaser: Bridging humanity with science, HearthMath helps us incorporate the heart’s intelligence into our day-to-day experiences. Deborah Rozman introduces powerful techniques that can help you to return to a state of coherence throughout your whole life.

title: Healing Through Time Travel
body:
What if you could travel through time to heal what ails you? Julia Mossbridge reveals some of the time travel therapies that she is developing and testing which can help to extend and increase one’s relationship with their own healthy, future-self. She is working with Institute of Noetic Sciences to further refine these practices that they have dubbed, temporaceuticals. This includes a concept called, Love Banking. It is a way that you can store moments of love, to help you during future moments of distress, to lighten your mood and improve your day.

Julia Mossbridge, MA, PhD is  the founder and research director of Mossbridge Institute, LLC, as well as a Visiting Scholar in the Psychology Department  at Northwestern University, a Fellow at the Institute of Noetic Sciences, the Science Director at Focus@Will Labs, and an Associated Professor in Integral and Transpersonal Psychology at the California Institute of Integral Studies.
teaser: What if you could travel through time to heal what ails you? Julia Mossbridge reveals some of the time travel therapies that she is developing and testing with Institute of Noetic Sciences, that they have dubbed, temporaceuticals.

title: Healthy-Happy with Ayurveda
body: What if a medical doctor told you, that loving yourself may be the most important thing you can do to drastically improve your health? Dr. Nita Desai, using the wisdom of Ayurveda, offers an approach to reaching a state of wellbeing that she calls, Healthy Happy. It is an unconditional state of happiness that is already within you and attained by a shifting of perception. She also explains many Ayurvedic approaches, including an energetic perspective on diets, one’s energetic constitution, and understanding the importance of spirituality and contentment for the wellbeing of the body.
teaser: Dr. Nita Desai, using the wisdom of Ayurveda, offers an approach to reaching a state of wellbeing that she calls, Healthy Happy. It is an unconditional state of happiness that is already within you and attained by a shifting of perception.

title: Work-out & Work-in
body: True well-being can only come through integrating body, mind, and spirit. With guest host, Ben Stewart, Paul Chek brings a unique holistic approach to corrective exercise, high-performance conditioning, and integrative lifestyle management. He encourages us to become consciously aware of our everyday movements. He calls it a “work-in,” where we turn ordinary actions, such as picking up a pencil, into exercise — by standing on one leg. Yet he has also effected nearly miraculous healings for some of the world’s top athletes after potentially career-ending injuries, as testified in a moving video chat with champion skateboarder Danny Way. Throughout, Paul demonstrates specific techniques and exercises, drawn from such traditions as qigong, to show us what we each can do to be our own best healer.
teaser: True well-being can only come through integrating body, mind, and spirit. Paul Chek brings a unique holistic approach to corrective exercise, high-performance conditioning, and integrative lifestyle management.

title: Integrative Health and Oneness
body:
You are more than you believe yourself to be. Dr. Paul J. Mills, Ph.D., whose current focus is on integrative medicine, insists that in order to truly heal yourself you need to go beyond your body, beyond your mind, and into an experience of oneness.  Through his extensive research, he’s found that true wellness can only be achieved by healing the whole person, consideration of which must include the our transcendent nature. While praising progress so far in the integrative model, he explains how further steps are needed, to better incorporate the elements of spiritual well-being. 

Dr. Paul Mills, Ph.D., is professor of family medicine and public health at the University of California, San Diego, and the Director of Research for the Chopra Foundation. He has published more than 350 scientific papers.
teaser: You are more than you believe yourself to be. Dr. Paul J. Mills, Ph.D., insists that in order to truly heal yourself you need to go beyond your body, beyond your mind, and into an experience of oneness.

title: The LifeLine Technique
body: Discover how to use the so-called problems of our bodies and minds as portals to access our true healing potential and help us achieve balance and purpose in our lives. Dr. Darren Weissman, DC, developed the LifeLine Technique, a unique practice that brings about positive change in our thoughts, behaviors, and the body’s natural ability for self-healing. Harnessing the power of infinite love and gratitude, the LifeLine Technique is an advanced holistic system that discovers, releases, and interprets the root cause of physical symptoms and stress-emotions trapped within the subconscious mind. Learn how to create a conscious dialogue with the subconscious, giving us the opportunity to lead it, rather than it leading us.
teaser: Harnessing the power of infinite love and gratitude, the LifeLine Technique is an advanced holistic system that discovers, releases, and interprets the root cause of physical symptoms and stress-emotions trapped within the subconscious mind.

title: The Gut Goddess
body: Did you know that illnesses including Parkinson's, brain fog, obesity, fatigue, and autoimmune disease are all related to failing gut health? The Gut Goddess, Grace Liu, explains how we can see our microbiome as a portfolio of bacteria, viruses, parasites, and fungi. Microbiome testing is key to healing and restoring balance to the body’s ecosystem. She explains that many of the antibiotics we take leave us vulnerable to illness and disease. To boost your own microbial diversity, she offers diet, detox, and probiotic protocols that are beneficial for everyone to know about.
teaser: Did you know that many illnesses are all related to failing gut health? The Gut Goddess, Grace Liu, explains how we can see our microbiome as a portfolio of bacteria, viruses, parasites, and fungi.

title: Pesticides Killing Our Microbes
body: The decline of nutrients in our food is not just a depletion of nutrients in the soil, but the decimation of the microbiomes within the substrate. Zach Bush exposes the unintended consequences from the glyphosate pesticides that are sterilizing the soil, our food, and our own microbiomes in a manner that is not sustainable. He calls for us to better educate ourselves, by building information networks with the massive amounts of information we already have access to. Plus, we need unfettered access to the deep wisdom embedded within the very soil that has not been sterilized by glyphosate and similar toxins.
teaser: The decline of nutrients in our food is not just a depletion of nutrients in the soil, but the decimation of the microbiomes within the substrate. Zach Bush exposes the unintended consequences from glyphosate pesticides and similar toxins.

title: Transformation Through Hardship
body: In each one of us, there is a deep message, that if ignored can lead to deep pain. When Danette May ignored her message, she hit rock bottom. But this helped her to make a powerful discovery that has helped many people face their deepest fears and radically change their lives. This change comes when you begin to unravel the beliefs and stories that have held you down. Then you are no longer in denial of the intuitive-self. She offers tips for tuning into your soul’s alignment to find your message and recognize your own truth, even if it sounds really strange
teaser: When Danette May ignored her message, she hit rock bottom. But this helped her to make a powerful discovery that has helped many people face their deepest fears and radically change their lives.

title: Boost Your Auric Biofield
body: Donna Eden’s work is helping western medicine pair with energy medicine, to bring deeper healing to the people who need it the most. She explains that we are energetic beings capable of taking control of our own true healing power. This was a powerful lesson she learned after facing an illness so debilitating that her doctors gave up on any options for recovery. She shares many of the tools she uses to help you connect with your body’s energy and boost your auric biofield.
teaser: Donna Eden’s work is helping western medicine pair with energy medicine, to bring deeper healing to the people who need it the most. She shares many of the tools she uses to help you connect with your body’s energy and boost your auric biofield.

title: Five Dimensions of Aging
body: Dr. Ed Park is convinced that we are not doomed to suffer as we get older. His goal is to better understand the process of aging and age-related illnesses, beyond the role of telomerase on telomeres. His work has given him a new understanding of the life cycle of the cells in our body which manifest in the five dimensions of aging. Plus, he is well aware of all the confusing and conflicting information we are bombarded with, which stems from a failure of the pharmacological model of aging. Thus, it is important to learn as much as you can about your own aging process, so you can make the best decisions for yourself.
teaser: Dr. Ed Park is convinced that we are not doomed to suffer as we get older. His goal is to better understand the process of aging and age-related illnesses, beyond the role of telomerase on telomeres.

title: Deep Techniques for Healing
body:
Michael Beckwith shares some of his most powerful techniques practices to help you move out of victimhood, give up blame, and learn how to take 100% responsibility for your own healing. Along with this comes techniques to amplify gratitude in your body to apply that in your connection with others and boost your affirmations.

His techniques include ways you can:
•	detox the soul with forgiveness
•	heal the heart with gratitude
•	awaken to your greatest potential

To understand these, he shares:
•	four stages for developing consciousness
•	the stages of forgiveness
•	the different levels of awakening
teaser: Michael Beckwith shares some of his most powerful techniques practices to help you move out of victimhood, give up blame, and learn how to take 100% responsibility for your own healing.

title: Releasing Trauma from the Body
body:
Deep within your body is the secret to start living your life from a place of purpose and fulfillment, but you need to release the pain of the past, first. Jonathan Tripodi takes us deep within the body to explain how traumatic and emotional events ebbed memory patterns deep within our cells. 

He developed a program he calls, Body Memory Recall, which can help to: 
•	facilitate the removal of old wounds
•	clear unknown emotional memories 
•	begin the process of self-healing 

This work can affect you on every level, reconnecting you to your full potential.
teaser: Jonathan Tripodi explains how traumatic and emotional events embed memory patterns deep within our cells. He developed a program he calls, Body Memory Recall, to facilitate the removal of old wounds and begin self-healing.

title: Microdosing for Healing
body:
Lane Carlson has devoted his life to traveling the world to discover different methods of healing. From light beds to ayahuasca, he shares some of the startling things he has learned about natural & ancestral medicines, as well as modern technology. Perhaps his most controversial work comes with microdosing of psychedelics. We hear from Daniel Carcillo, who was cast out from the NHL and the Chicago Blackhawks because of his use of microdosing to help treat his own traumatic brain injury. Together they are pressing for the legal therapeutic use of psychoactive substances, which show great promise in scientific studies.

You will learn:
•	Various healing methods from ancestral to cutting edge
•	Benefits of microdosing psychedelics
•	Scientific discoveries which are changing the legality of these medicines
teaser: Lane Carlson has devoted his life to traveling the world to discover different methods of healing. Perhaps his most controversial work comes with microdosing of psychedelics.

title: Chakras and Healing Trauma
body: Our bodies are maps that can guide us to experiencing health or imbalance.  Deborah King, a New York Times best-selling author and master healer, unveils the connection between hidden inner trauma and poor health. We must look deep inside to discover the source of our problems, and we must face these issues squarely and honestly in order to disarm them. First, she takes us through the chakras, showing the connection between each chakra’s inner organs and the kinds of emotional trauma associated with that chakra. Then she reveals how a series of different early-life traumas can affect character and even body type.
teaser: Our bodies are maps that can guide us to experiencing health or imbalance.  Deborah King unveils the connection between hidden inner trauma and poor health

title: Shamangelic Healing
body: Clear out physical and emotional toxicity. Healing requires a journey to identify and release core issues and wounds that have been at play, often for a lifetime. To that end, Anahata Ananda developed shamangelic healing — combining the wisdom of a shaman with the compassion of an angel. Calling on many modalities of shamanism, she guides profound journeys of core healing and spiritual awakening. By generating a deep emotional clearing, Anahata provides the tools and empowerment to offer the freedom to write the next chapter of one’s life.
teaser: Anahata Ananda developed shamangelic healing — combining the wisdom of a shaman with the compassion of an angel. Calling on many modalities of shamanism, she guides profound journeys of core healing and spiritual awakening.

title: 8 Steps to a Pain-Free Back
body: The Gokhale Method is a revolutionary program that shows people how to use posture and movement to restore their structural integrity and banish pain. With 90 percent of Americans having suffered at some time from back pain, a natural solution to end pain and experience true vitality is an amazing resource. Healer Esther Gokhale created the plan and also wrote the bestseller 8 Steps to a Pain-Free Back. She maintains that by working with posture we can regain the ease of body that is our birthright.
teaser: Healer Esther Gokhale created the Gokhale Method, a revolutionary program that shows people how to use posture and movement to restore their structural integrity and banish pain.

title: The LifeQuake Phenomenon
body: You don’t need to suffer and experience disaster to initiate change in your life. Psychotherapist Dr. Toni Galardi thought she had it all figured out until her life began to fall apart. After a series of car accidents, she completely changed her life, and discovered how to prepare for and embrace change.  With Dr. Galardi’s LifeQuake Phenomenon you can learn to move forward with a greater ease into your life’s purpose and possibly prevent devastation or a major life disaster. But if you are faced with depression, despair, addiction, and crisis, these tools can show you how to greet change not with resistance, but resilience.
teaser: You don’t need to suffer and experience disaster to initiate change in your life. With Dr. Toni Galardi’s Lifequake Phenomenon, you can learn to move forward with a greater ease into your life’s purpose.

title: Psychedelic Therapy
body: Psychedelic therapy is on the cutting edge of healing today. Daniel McQueen and his Center for Medicinal Mindfulness have become established leaders of the movement to provide safe and legal psychedelic medicine experiences for personal and global healing and transformation. In treating some of the most challenging emotional struggles, especially trauma, psychedelics have been shown to have exceptional efficacy. For some who suffer from serious psychological concerns, psychedelic therapy may be just the protocol that brings profound personal growth and much needed relief.
teaser: Psychedelic therapy is on the cutting edge of healing today. Daniel McQueen and his Center for Medicinal Mindfulness have become established leaders of the movement to provide safe and legal psychedelic medicine experiences.

title: What Are We Eating!?
body: After Robyn O’Brien’s own child experienced a severe allergic reaction, she began a deep dive into researching nutrition industry standards. She demanded answers from the food industry. She came to ask, “Are we allergic to food? Or allergic to what’s been done to it?”  For when it comes to wellness, we know we can avoid prescriptions, alcohol, and tobacco, but the one thing we cannot cut out is food — and food is the most important input in any health care system.  For dealing with food allergens, GMOs, and the unhealthy truth surrounding the food industry, knowledge is power. If we don’t claim that power, generations to come will suffer.
teaser: Are we allergic to food? Or allergic to what’s been done to it?  For when it comes to wellness, we know we can avoid prescriptions, alcohol, and tobacco, but the one thing we cannot cut out is food — and food is the most important input in any health care system.

title: Inner Bonding & Self-Love
body: Tune into your true worth and start living from a place of self love — a place where real healing can occur. A psychologist and best-selling author, Dr. Margaret Paul developed her inner bonding program thirty years ago to help you become a loving adult to your inner child. Inner Bonding teaches people to love themselves, and has helped countless people identify and rapidly heal the root cause of their pain and learn a path to joy and loving relationships. She offers clear, step-by-step directions on how to connect with your higher guidance and learn to define your own worth — not by externals or how others define you, but by your own intrinsic qualities.
teaser: Tune into your true worth and start living from a place of self love — a place where real healing can occur. A psychologist and best-selling author, Dr. Margaret Paul developed her inner bonding program thirty years ago to help you become a loving adult to your inner child.

title: The Power of Charcoal
body: David Avocado Wolfe, in his search for the best substances for health and longevity, “discovered” charcoal, and now he takes it every day. We live in a toxic world; our food, air, and water are loaded with toxins. Charcoal has long been used to filter air and water and even as an antidote to several poisons. In his research, Wolfe discovered that carbon 60 is the number one longevity substance ever found, and it is contained in charcoal — and everybody has access to it. He explains how it works and offers instructions and cautions to help anyone get started on a path to deep wellness.
teaser: David Avocado Wolfe, in his search for the best substances for health and longevity, “discovered” charcoal, and now he takes it every day.

title: Clean: The Body Heals Itself
body: Our bodies are amazingly designed to heal themselves, but they are constantly being overtaxed by the steadily rising number of toxins all around us. A leader in the functional medicine field, Dr. Alejandro Junger created the best-selling program Clean, which has helped thousands of people detox their way to true health and vitality. He details the biological processes that underlie cleansing and detoxification and proceeds to catalogue many of the foods that the body finds most challenging. Dr. Junger’s remarkably effective detox program can be a powerful tool to restore the natural functioning of our bodily systems and regain the well-being for which we are truly designed.
teaser: Dr. Alejandro Junger created the best-selling program Clean, which has helped thousands of people detox their way to true health and vitality.

title: Introduction to Iodine
body:
Every cell in the body needs and requires iodine to survive. Yet, of all the elements known so far to be essential to life itself and human health, iodine is the most misunderstood. Dr. David Brownstein, a board-certified physician and a foremost practitioner of holistic medicine, is here to set the record straight about iodine’s amazing healing properties.  In this first episode of a four-part mini-series, he explains how iodine is needed and used throughout the body, gives a history of iodine’s medical use over the years, explores the myths and misinformation about its use, and discusses the forms and dosages that are most effective. 

David Brownstein, M.D., is a conventionally trained board-certified family physician with the additional overlay of holistic principles. While Dr. Brownstein does not claim to have a cure for any illness, he does believe that we can enhance the individual’s immune system by supporting the “host” and the terrain of the host. The human body is well designed and the immune system, when given the proper support, can optimally function.
teaser: Every cell in the body needs and requires iodine to survive. Yet, of all the elements known so far to be essential to life itself and human health, iodine is the most misunderstood.

title: Iodine and the Thyroid
body:
Fatigue, weight gain, depression, constipation — these are just a few of the more common symptoms of the dysfunction of the thyroid, a little gland that exerts an enormous influence over the entire body. Dr. David Brownstein, one of the foremost practitioners of holistic medicine, has been studying the true causes of thyroid dysfunction over two decades. His revolutionary treatment plan, with the use of iodine supplementation at its core, has effectively helped thousands of patients to date. Dr. Brownstein describes in detail how the thyroid functions, the role of iodine, and its common disorders — including thyroid cancer, which is the fastest growing cancer in the U.S. right now. 

David Brownstein, M.D., is a conventionally trained board-certified family physician with the additional overlay of holistic principles. While Dr. Brownstein does not claim to have a cure for any illness, he does believe that we can enhance the individual’s immune system by supporting the “host” and the terrain of the host. The human body is well designed and the immune system, when given the proper support, can optimally function.
teaser: Dr. Brownstein describes in detail how the thyroid functions, the role of iodine, and its common disorders — including thyroid cancer, which is the fastest growing cancer in the U.S. right now.

title: Iodine and Glandular Cancers
body:
Hormone-sensitive cancers are occurring at epidemic rates. For example, one in seven women are affected by breast cancer and one in three men are affected by prostate cancer. While there are numerous reasons for the development of cancer, something you might not be aware of — and the research is clear — is that iodine deficiency is a major piece of the cancer puzzle. Dr. David Brownstein explains that iodine deficiency has been associated with other hormone-sensitive cancers, including thyroid, ovarian, uterine, pancreatic, even fibrocystic breast disease. In this episode, we will learn that iodine — which is effective and inexpensive — could be a key to help solve a global health crisis. 

David Brownstein, M.D., is a conventionally trained board-certified family physician with the additional overlay of holistic principles. While Dr. Brownstein does not claim to have a cure for any illness, he does believe that we can enhance the individual’s immune system by supporting the “host” and the terrain of the host. The human body is well designed and the immune system, when given the proper support, can optimally function.
teaser: Dr. David Brownstein explains that iodine deficiency has been associated with other hormone-sensitive cancers, including thyroid, ovarian, uterine, pancreatic, even fibrocystic breast disease.

title: Iodine, Salt & Holistic Treatments
body:
Without salt, life itself would not be possible. According to Dr. David Brownstein, salt, like iodine, is another badly misunderstood yet essential element. In his holistic medical practice, Dr. Brownstein finds deficiencies in these essential elements are often the root causes of maladies that conventional medicine only treats symptomatically with drugs. In the final episode of this ground-breaking four-part mini-series, Dr. Brownstein delves into the workings of the holistic approach, touching upon such other typical deficiencies as B12 and Selenium, the value of a good diet, the applications of ozone therapy, and the importance of simply drinking enough water. 

David Brownstein, M.D., is a conventionally trained board-certified family physician with the additional overlay of holistic principles. While Dr. Brownstein does not claim to have a cure for any illness, he does believe that we can enhance the individual’s immune system by supporting the “host” and the terrain of the host. teaser: In the final episode of this ground-breaking four-part mini-series, Dr. Brownstein delves into the workings of the holistic approach, touching upon such other typical deficiencies as B12 and Selenium, the value of a good diet, the applications of ozone therapy, and the importance of simply drinking enough water.

title: Biological Dentistry Breakthroughs
body: In this special edition of Healing Matrix, we meet  Dr. Blanche Grube who explains how Biological Dentistry saved her life and the lives of many of her patients. Together with Dr. Ed Group, they discuss the major pitfalls we face with routine procedures in modern dentistry, from mercury fillings to root canals. This is something that Dr. Grube learned firsthand when she began her studies with Biological Dentistry pioneer, Hal Huggins. She discusses her difficulty with reading & concentration, and the surprise cancer diagnosis that came from a blood test result as part of her initial training with Dr. Huggins. After the removal of 18 mercury fillings and 5 root canal teeth, her symptoms dramatically improved. Now she leads the way to healthier lives for many people who have embraced her pioneering techniques.
teaser: In this special edition of Healing Matrix, we meet  Dr. Blanche Grube who explains how Biological Dentistry saved her life and the lives of many of her patients. Now she leads the way to healthier lives for many people who have embraced her pioneering techniques.

title: Dangers of Mercury in Your Mouth
body: Can you imagine putting a toxic chemical into your mouth that could cause a lifetime of disease and degraded lifestyle? Dr. Blanche Grube and Dr. Ed Group say this is exactly what happens when we agree to mercury fillings at the dentist office. They discuss the history of using mercury to fill teeth and the battles that ensued over the toxicity vs. ease which resulted in the amalgam wars. The most recent of which was spearheaded by Biological Dentistry pioneer, Hal Huggins. Dr. Grube discusses the many effects of mercury fillings, including depression, anxiety, chronic fatigue, allergies, and autoimmune disorders. She explains that one atom of mercury can kill one cell, but it doesn’t stop there until the mercury is removed from the mouth and cleared from the body.
teaser: Can you imagine putting a toxic chemical into your mouth that could cause a lifetime of disease and degraded lifestyle? Dr. Blanche Grube and Dr. Ed Group say this is exactly what happens when we agree to mercury fillings at the dentist office.

title: Reversing Mercury Damage
body: Despite the overwhelming evidence of harm caused by mercury, it is still used every day, is there a way reverse the damage? In this discussion with Dr. Ed Wood, Dr. Blanche Grube takes us deeper into the effects of mercury on the body and how to restore its health, including various detox protocols. Then we talk with a patient of Dr. Grube’s whose life changed dramatically after the removal of his mercury fillings. She explains that this is a very thorough process beginning with supplementation and a bio-compatibility test to ensure the correct materials are used to fill the teeth. To show us how this works, Dr. Grube invites us into her laboratory where they test for bio-compatible materials, and into the operatory to see how they set up for safe mercury removal.
teaser: In this discussion with Dr. Ed Wood, Dr. Blanche Grube takes us deeper into the effects of mercury on the body and how to restore its health, including various detox protocols.

title: The Price of Root Canals
body: Could root canals be the root cause of many devastating diseases in the body? Dr. Blanche Grube had five root canal teeth removed and almost instantly her cancer disappeared. With Dr. Ed Group, we examine what a root canal is, why they are done, and the lasting consequences to the body as bacteria and toxins grow underneath the now dead tooth. This all came to light from Dr. Weston Price who tragically learned these consequences when his 16-year-old son died from the subsequent effects of a root canal that he himself administered. The fight was then taken up by Dr. Hal Huggins who discovered the types of bacteria thriving within root canal conditions, including Lyme disease. Dr. Grube then explains how a root canal tooth is removed and the amazing improvements to health that thousands of her patients have experienced after the safe extraction.
teaser: Dr. Blanche Grube discusses what a root canal is, why they are done, and the lasting consequences to the body as bacteria and toxins grow underneath the now dead tooth.

title: Oral Health and Chronic Illness
body: Losing a tooth can be an arduous ordeal, but it is nothing compared to the health consequences if that tooth is not properly treated. Dr. Blanche Grube and Dr. Ed Group discuss cavitations and implants, which can result from a removed tooth, and both pose serious risks to the rest of the body. Dr. Grube explains that a cavitation, not properly addressed, creates a hole in the bone that doesn't heal where bacteria and toxins build up, which can lead to chronic illnesses. Problems with implants include the body rejecting them, the electrical fields they create that interfere with the way the brain works, and the implants’ effects on the organs in the body. As we wrap up this discussion on Biological Dentistry, we explore various misconceptions from modern dentistry and the things you can do to maintain oral health which affects your overall wellbeing.
teaser: Dr. Blanche Grube and Dr. Ed Group discuss cavitations and implants, which can result from a removed tooth, and both pose serious risks to the rest of the body.
